title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: We're craving for change but nobody is ready to change their perspective. This is the only country where leaders are different from citizens, (2in1 con3 pipu) lol. We're looking for good leaders and keep voting for wrong leaders, country where they leaders citizens conscience with peanut's.We're getting worst by the day because even me that is complaining, nobody know my mindset, we said one thing and do another thing. How can change come when inside you is not yet change? We love election money more than the future we dream for. Half bread is better than kpuff kpuff, that's the code for collecting bribe. This country will be better if the citizens are ready and willing to be better. This country is our future but the future is not a football field. Let's start the change within our hearts. Election is coming again don't help anyone to win by bribes, let them win by merits.

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: Honestly, this country is really funny. We don't practice what we preach. We preach a better change and practice another bad change. During election, the politicians will come and lie to us and promise us heaven on earth, after voting for them they will totally forget about the citizens and the promise they made to them. I fell so sorry for those who sold their right during election because they will never be remembered. The country and the leaders will not change if we the citizen don't change. The change must begin with us.

I will not question you about whether you vote or not, but as the Nigerian citizen that you are, which political party did you think was supposed to win the presidential election? And are you of the opinion that APC won the election because citizens took bribes and voted for them? If that's your opinion, you are wrong about it. Some threads like this are just palter babbles. There are a lot of threads like this on this board; just visit them and start your argument there. Do you know about election rigging?

As Nigeria d as large so, em no d good for you to generalize wetin some few people the do, to the general public like sae na wetin Nigerians are known for. We get so many integrity people wey for the country wey no fit sell themselves to politicians because of peanut wey politician the give for election. The current situation wey our country don d so, don make almost everyone to wise up for them not trade their future for peanut but rather to capture this our country back from the hands of this our bad politicians wey don hold our country on hostage for long.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Every good change we looking out from this country begins with you, and boils down to how you choose to follow laid down moral rules and values of society. We can't be hoping for a better NIGERIA where because you know someone working in the bank then you don't stand at bank queue anymore, you just boycott the process through who you know. Because nobody is watching you beat the traffic and use the wrong U-turn, you ain't even accountable to little things of life not to talk of managing state affairs. This is where and how our problems can be changed when we realized and do the right things even when no one is watching. Naija can be great again.... E fit happen!
